00100021.name: IssuerOfPatientID
00100021.description: Identifier of the Assigning Authority (system, organization, agency, or department) that issued the Patient ID.

00100024.name: IssuerOfPatientIDQualifiersSequence
00100024.description: Attributes specifying or qualifying the identity of the issuer of the Patient ID, or scoping the Patient ID. Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

00400035.name: IdentifierTypeCode
00400035.description: Type of Patient ID. Refer to HL7 v2 Table 0203 for Defined Terms.

00400036.name: AssigningFacilitySequence
00400036.description: Place or location identifier where the Patient ID was first assigned. Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

00400039.name: AssigningJurisdictionCodeSequence
00400039.description: The geo-political body that assigned the Patient ID. Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.

0040003A.name: AssigningAgencyOrDepartmentCodeSequence
0040003A.description: The agency or department that assigned the Patient ID. Only a single Item is permitted in this Sequence.
